name: Causality Fragment
label: Non-Gear Item
description: At any time, you may replace a d20 roll with either a 20 or a 1. This can be any d20 roll at all. You may only do this once, but you can decide after the dice has been rolled and the outcome has been announced.

name: Insignia of Valor
label: Reward
description: A character with the Sparri Insignia of Valor gains a +2 Trigger: Impress or Boast. If characters already have this or another similar trigger, add a +2 bonus to it.
